DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the efficacy and safety of rosuvastatin with simvastatin and atorvastatin in reducing levels of low density lipoprotein cholesterol in subjects with hypercholesterolaemia
DOC.brief_title: Comparing the Efficacy and Safety of Rosuvastatin With Atorvastatin and Simvastatin (SOLAR)
DOC.criteria: Member of managed care plan for hypercholesterolemia Fasting blood lipid levels as defined by the protocol Diagnosis of coronary heart disease, diabetes, or atherosclerotic disease, or presence of multiple risk factors giving high risk of coronary heart disease The use of lipid lowering drugs or dietary supplements after Visit 1. Active arterial disease eg Unstable angina, or recent arterial surgery Blood lipid levels above the limits defined in the protocol. Uncontrolled hypertension, hypothyroidism, alcohol or drug abuse
